doc.title: Petticoat Junction

credit.role: King Ring A Ding Herbie Willis
Timothy T. Temkin, Attorney At Law

doc.plot: Bobbie Jo, Billie Jo, and Betty Jo Bradley are three sisters living with there Uncle Jo who owns the family hotel, and is always coming up with zany ideas. Their whole town revolves around the train "The Cannon Ball". The show also includes Kate, Steve, and Sam Drucker, who is also in "Green Acres".
